url.title: The Visual Studio Documentary
url.description: This is an hour long documentary that takes you behind the scenes of Microsoft's "Visual Studio". We go back to the very beginning when Alan Cooper sold Visual Basic to Bill Gates in 1988 &#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Visual Studio Documentary: S. Somasegar Full Length Interview
video:video.video:description: S. Somasegar made an enormous impact in The Visual Studio Documentary and talks deeply and passionately about the future of Visual Studio. He dives into the features, direction and tools. He gets i&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Visual Studio Documentary: Jason Zander Full Length Interview
video:video.video:description: The Visual Studio Documentary Part One andPart Two. S. Somasegar's Full Length Interview Jason Zander is the General Manager for the Visual Studio Team here at Microsoft. He was an enormous asset t&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Visual Studio Documentary: Part One (In celebration of the 2010 Launch)
video:video.video:description: Welcome to the first installment of the Visual Studio Documentary.This is an hour long documentary that is split into two parts, roughly a half hour each. Welcome to part one, where we take you back t&#8230;

video:video.video:title: The Visual Studio Documentary: Part Two (In celebration of the 2010 Launch)
video:video.video:description: Welcome to the Visual Studio Documentary. This is an hour long documentary that is split into two parts. Roughly a half hour each. Welcome to part two, where we dive straight into life at Microsoft d&#8230;
